citations.narrative:
The acquisition record for breeding stock of adult chinchillas maintained at the facility (per facility acquired last year) was
not available at the time of inspection. Acquisition records for animals are required and can be important if animal health
tracing needs to be done. Ensure to obtain acquisition information for chinchillas on hand (facility representative made
phone calls during inspection to get seller's address) and then maintain acquisition records up to date that have the
required information.
***Correct by 6/2/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
